title: Just Checking In.
body:
I don't know why I didnt think of posting my story on this page sooner. I tell my friends about this all the time, mostly because it's the only real "creepy" thing thats ever happened to me. Makes for a great conversation.

This happened probably 4 years ago. My mother and I were sitting on the couch watching funny videos and talking, we had the whole house to ourselves. -My dad's a plumber and had gone out of town for a few days to take a licensing test or something.- So it was just us.

Anyways, we stayed up until about 2:30 in the morning talking about family and other things, watching FailArmy. It's a favorite in this house. And after a while decided to go to bed.

Our rooms are right next to each other in a long hallway that connects everything in our house, my parents room is the last door on the right, and down one is mine. I gave my momma a kiss goodnight and went and layed down and started scrolling Facebook, Instagram, whatever.

Living in a house long enough you recognize the certain sounds and creaks it makes, whether it's the old pipes clanking, the house settling, the clinks from the old air conditioner, or footsteps... And footsteps in this house were very easy to recognize.

My house is pretty old, and the lady who owned it before us had a crap ton of cats, so to protect the baseboards of the house she layed a thick layer of plastic all through the house, underneath the carpet, so whenever you stepped not only did the floorboards creak, but the plastic crunched.

So, back to me laying in bed, I could hear the footsepts in the hallway, and I assumed it was my mom going to get a cup of water. I didn't hear her door open, so I figured I just wasn't paying attention. I heard the footsepts come up the hall past the bathroom, and stop at my room. And then I heard my door open. She didn't say anything, and I didn't either. - My parents regularly checked on me at night to see if I was sleeping, or if I was home.- So I just thought that's what she was doing. I heard my door close and then heard the last few footsteps up to my parents room, then a long pause, followed by the door opening and closing.

I laid there for a few minutes.. just thinking. You know, that guy feeling when something doesn't feel right. I decided to go see if my mom needed something. I sat up in bed and took a breath before I walked out of my bedroom, my heart was pounding. I was almost certain it was just my mom going to the kitchen, and then checking on me. I don't know why I was working myself up. I tend to over think everything, and have always been an extremely paranoid person. I opened my door and looked into the hallway and right when I did, my parents door opened and my mom poked her head out of the door.

We kind of just stared at each other for a minute, and then she asked me: "Did you just come open my door?"
author: a-simplepinetree
